‚Äúboho‚Äù wisheshagnyayin china wishabija yuddhaya pilibanda kumanthrana nyayanta wiruddha bawata karana prakasha nomanga yawana suluya, aththa washayenma: siyalu widya wisheshagnyayo, mema padanam wirahitha ha gini awuluwana prakasha prathikshepa karathi.

me athara, polispathi pujith jayasundara mahathata sathi dekaka kalayak thula illa aswime lipiya bhara dena lesa agamathiwaraya ho janadhipathiwaraya wisin kisidu danum dimak nokala bawa da niyojya amathya nalin bandara mahatha pawasayi.

niyama stalinwadi "kalakaruweku" huwa dakwena aakaraye dasunakata aasanna ekakayi waradawa salaka ganimata lakwiya haki ekama darshanaya wanne, yuddhaya awasanaye stefan wisin pawathwanu labana, obe wicharaya awasan karamin oba uputa dakwa athi kathawayi.
mata nam hina yanne ban ee anthimata samir gana liyapu kathawata.
sisilasal danawana watapitawak.
ehi prathipalaya wuye pothuwil saha thirikkowil pradeshiya lekam kettasa deke me idam himiyan sanmbandhayen jangama sewayak pawathwimata thiranaya kirimayi.

kohama hari anthimata onna wibageth liwwa.prathipalath aawa.menna bole mama ihalinma pas wela.matath wada ape ammatayi ,tichatayi godakma sathutuyi.ape iskolen kohoma hari haya hath denekma ihalinma pas wela thibuna ekenuth matayi mage yaluwekutayi thama ihalama lakunu thibbe.ithin iskola walata illum paththarath damma.masa deka thunakata passe iskolekata athul wime prawesha pathrayath awith thibuna.

rate athi bahutharayak podu mahajanathawa sitinne janadhipathi maithripala sirisena ha agramathya mahinda rajapaksha mahathwarun samanga bawath me awasthawedi parlimenthu maha mathiwaranayakata giyahoth eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya ha shri lanka podujana peramuna athulu balawegawalata pahasuwen parlimenthuwe aasana 130kata aasanna sankhyawak jayagrahanaya kala haki bawada aananda aluthgamage mahatha penwa deyi.

thawa kenek katin prashne noahuwath, balana balme hungak de adangu bawa ithama pahadiliyi..

oba wahanseta me thiyena balayata me rata diyunu karanna puluwan.

ee gana wigraha nokarami.

durastha pradeshaya kisidu balaya thibena bawa ehidi mema paddhathiya pulul lesa bhawitha karayi; balashakthi paribhojanaya ha parisara dushanaya adu kirima ha piriwaya galawa ganima pinisa, eya balaya bhawitha awashyatha sapuralima sandaha surya, sulan ha jaiwa skandha adala we.

eheth wyaparayaka aarambhaka awadiyedi ewani paduwakata muhunadimata siduwuwahoth eya mulu aayathanayatama dadi lesa balapanawa,‚Äù kularathna mahatha pawasuwe, wyaparayak sawadhanawa saha parikshakari lesa karagena yame wadagathkama thawaduratath pahadili karamini.

mema eekakaya sthapitha kala pasu, midi wala ihala dakwa wardhanaya wima aarambha karayi.
ee wenuwata owun ilakka kale yuropiya sangamayata ekathu wimataya.
mata sthri dushana nathara karanna puluwan kiyala boru porondu dila balayata enna awashyathawayak naha.
manaliyage parshwaya wenuwen assan thabuwe daksha krikat kridakayaku menma krikat paripalanayata sambandha niladhariyaku wu jerom jayarathnayi.
atha paya waru nathi angawikala anshabhaga rogiyek.
tharagawali nathi nisa thawath kridikawan bihiwenawa aduyi.
eheth ese wana bawata chodana nam api nirathuruwa asamu.
sudu athkota kamisayakin da, sudu saramakin da sarasi sitina thaththa, thekka liyen sadunu, wisal siya guru mesayata ayithi andi putuwe wadi wi sitiyi.

heya kalar ekak karaganmata sewadayakayaku pamini wita owunge kondaye swabhawaya nirogi bawa gana awadhanaya yomu nokara eya kirima nusudusu bawa saha hisakes damej wi athnam palamuwa ee sandaha sathkara, prathikara kara hisakes nirogimath karaganme awashyathawa owunta wataha dima awashyabawa apa obata pawasuwa mathaka athi.

ratata ahimi wu ema purawasthuwalin kotasak ho nawatha athpath karaganime kramawedayak sakas kirime awashyathawaya atha.me anuwa 1888 n pasuwa ada dakwath purawasthu aagnyapanath walin shri lankawe chanchala purawasthu aaraksha kirimata wiwidha naithika kriyamarga gena thibunath, purawasthu winasha kirima, wikruthi kirima, sorakam kirima ha wideshagatha kirima yana wiwidhakara kramawalata mewa winashayata pathwe.ebawin, anagatha parapura wenuwen chanchala purawasthuwala aarakshawa thahawuru kirima was chanchala purawasthu lekhanagatha kirime wadapiliwelak purawidya departhamenthuwa wisin aarambha kara thibe.
